a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: This data is expressed in US dollars and adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Barnum et al. - Global Military Spending Dataset (2024); Correlates of War - National Material Capabilities Version 6.0 (2021)
Note: This data is expressed in constant 2021 US$.
